name: Hero's Last Words
description:
You are Seren, the Hero of these lands. You've almost reached the summit of the mountain where you are set to defeat a great evil; but before that, your fiancée wants a word.

This was made for the O2A2 Jam - Queer Edition! As such it's a very short game (one thousand words, one sprite, one background...).

This takes place before the events of The Hero's Journey! It doesn't spoil the events of THJ and can be played independently from it.

(if you'd like to write a comment here that spoils aspects of THJ's story, please clearly mark it as being SPOILERS!)

Credits
Art, story and programming by maneki-mushi

Sound from zapsplat
